data.actual_result: The video doesn't resize, showing only the top left corner and hiding the bottom right buttons
data.expected_result: The video should resize to fit the smaller resolution game
data.short_description: Full screening videos in the Overlay causes them to be improperly sized if the game's resolution is below 1920 x 1080
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up a game that's resolution is below 1920 x 1080 - Open the Overlay and find an MP4 or YouTube video in a chat channel - Play and full screen the video and observe
